track.name: Cherry Oh Baby
comments: MackSpane. Interesting input. Are you aware you sound like a pedantic, misguided chump?

Sorry raggae fans, but this is ska, not raggae.  Raggae is to the Rhastafarian religion what Gospel music is to the Christian religion.  UB40 doesn't have any rhastafarian influence, and thus is ska, ska being music with a reggae type beat, but without the religious overtones.  I hate raggae. I love ska.
Saw them live in Hong Kong in 1992-93, simply amazing!
the white reggae band where the majority of the members are not white! NOT pop-reggae, simply Birmingham's finest
Unemployment Benefit 40. Hahaha!! I love them to death.
you you you... i m so happy
I fuked to this song b4..
I've seen them live several times and always had a blast.
First heard UB40 in 1980, then I saw them live that  summer in NYC. Wow, how time flies. Love everything the do. Big Fan!
LOVE IT ... LOVE IT ... LOVE IT!!!
